name: mirrodin besieged
text: Mirrodin Besieged is the second set in the Scars of Mirrodin block. It is the 54th Magic expansion and was released on February 4, 2011.

name: Ajani Goldmane
text: Ajani Goldmane is a white-and-green-aligned planeswalker.

name: Journey into NYX
text: Journey into Nyx is the third and final set in the Theros block. It is the 64th Magic expansion and was released May 2014.

name: 2015 Core Set
text: Magic: The Gathering 2015 Core Set, commonly referred to as Magic 2015 or M15 is the 16th Magic core set. It was released on July 18, 2014.
